fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
- Choose any combination of these attributes to give yourself each night:
- Blackmailed
- Framed
- Appears as if visited a target of your choice
- Appears as if did not visit a certain player
- Get dealt a basic attack next night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Appears innocent
- If you win you transform into a serial killer (except you don't need to win by killing everyone as a serial killer).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be healed from your own attack, be visited by an investigative while framed by yourself, or don't be hanged while blackmailed by yourself.
